title: Type ID Dotted font
content:
hello, has anyone seen this font and knows how it is called? Thank you for your help. brstein

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021010615im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Henri896_3971.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Henri896.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021010615/http:/typophile.com/files/Henri896.jpg) | 37.2 KB |
author: brstein

comments.content: Don't know this one. Looks like a dotted version of [Neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021010615/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface). The closest I have is [Dot Soon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021010615/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/dot-soon-nf).
Great! That is it. Love the font. Thank you so much!!!
